// libraty import import React from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import { Toaster } from 'react-hot-toast' import { useFormik } from 'formik' // files import import avatar from '../assets/profile.png' import styles from '../styles/Styles.module.css' import { validateUsername } from '../helper/Validate.js' const Username = () => { const formik = useFormik({ initialValues: { username: '', email: '', password: '' }, validate: validateUsername, validateOnBlur: false, validateOnChange: false, // onSubmit onSubmit: async values => { console.log(values) } }) return ( <>
{/* Toaster */}

Welcome Back!

{/* Form start */}
Not a Member? Register Now
{/* Form end */}
) } export default Username
